original_text: “On the north side shall be the standard of the camp of Dan by their companies, the chief of the people of Dan being Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai,
korean_text: 북쪽에는 단 군대 진영의 군기가 있을 것이라 단 자손의 지휘관은 암미삿대의 아들 아히에셀이요

sentences.original_text: On the north side shall be the standard
of the camp of Dan by their companies,
The chief of the people of Dan is Ahiezer
